channel.title: MaxQDA on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in MaxQDA on Machine Learning

item.title: QDA - Comparison & Tips
item.description: QDA can be used for literature review, but not bibtex management. For bibtex/latex management, see Reference and Knowledge Management (Zotero, Qiqqa). I wrote this blog in a short time, please leave a comment if you find any mistakes. As a PhD student, I found QDA method and software are very useful. However, I need to choose software carefully due to the lock-in effects, which is not a problem for Zotero-like reference management software.
